files.description: Documents the catalog directory purpose, required files, and how the case study schema and CLI are used to create and index case studies.

errors.detail:

DIR_STATE:["outputs/catalog/README.md", "outputs/catalog/catalog.json"]
SUMMARY:Wrote concise documentation for the case-study catalog directory, schema contract, and CLI-driven creation/indexing workflow.

files.description: Defines a JSON Schema for catalog metadata and case study records to enable consistent validation and tooling interoperability.

SUMMARY: Wrote a Draft 2020-12 JSON Schema covering case study records, case study index metadata, and catalog metadata for consistent validation.

Summary: Wrote a JSON Schema defining canonical CaseStudy and Index document formats for consistent validation and tooling interoperability.

files.description: Implements a Python CLI that creates outputs/case_studies/<slug>/case_study.json from inputs, validates it against the schema, and updates outputs/case_studies/index.json atomically.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:src/cli/add_case_study.py
DIR_STATE:["src/cli/add_case_study.py"]
Summary: Implemented a standalone add_case_study CLI that writes a validated case_study.json and atomically updates outputs/case_studies/index.json.

FILE_WRITTEN:src/cli/add_case_study.py
DIR_STATE:["src/cli/add_case_study.py"]
Summary: Added a standalone CLI to create/validate case study JSON files and atomically update the case study index.

files.description: Contains functions to read, update, sort, and write the case study index.json in a safe and deterministic manner.

files.description: Centralizes filesystem path resolution for outputs/catalog and outputs/case_studies to keep CLI behavior consistent across environments.

files.description: Provides a minimal, valid case study JSON template used by the CLI as the starting structure when creating new case studies.

missionDescription: Create /outputs/catalog/ with METADATA_SCHEMA.json (or JSON Schema), plus a small add_case_study.py CLI that writes a new /outputs/case_studies/<slug>/case_study.json and updates an index file (e.g., /outputs/case_studies/index.json).
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Establishes a machine-readable case-study catalog (schema + CLI) so future research inputs (case studies, exemplars, citations, rights metadata) can be added consistently and programmatically, enablin...
projectName: /outputs/catalog/ with METADATA_SCHEMA.json (or JSON Schema), plus a small add_case_study.py CLI that writes a new /outputs/case_studies/<slug>/case_study.json and updates an index file (e.g., /outputs/case_studies/index.json).
